name: Under Connection
description:
Change between two players and try not to break the line. The line breaks if two miners are too far from each other. The goal is to collect all gold ores from the level. Also, watch out for the snails!

There is a total of 4 levels

Controls:

1 - red miner

2 - green miner

And obviously A, D, and SPACE

I want to apologize for all bugs but I had like an hour to complete this game :(

Some assets are from Wishforge Games
